title: Ticket #5066: Add index entry to the manual
description:
From HTCondor Users:

1. where is SETTABLE_ATTRS_CONFIG documented? All I see in the index is "Variable SETTABLE_ATTRS_CONFIG must also be defined." in several places @ http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.2/3_3Configuration.html#18010

Can I do e.g. "SETTABLE_ATTRS_CONFIG = *"?

yes, it's just not findable via TFM index. Is it possible to add a link to 3.6.11 to SETTABLE_ATTRS_CONFIG in the index?
check_ins: 2015-Jun-02 15:38   Check-in [44934]: correct index entries related to SETTABLE_ATTRS_<PERMISSION-LEVEL> #5066 (By Karen Miller )
creator: tim
